src:
Hejvordova partija karijere – 39 poena bez promašaja za dva! Lebron opet tripl-dabl, Jokić ispod proseka
Šesta uzastopna pobeda Lejkersa

06 Nov 2019

Iako je Lebron Džejms upisao novi tripl-dabl i vodio Lejkerse do pobede u Čikagu, faca večeri u NBA ligi je Gordon Hejvord!
Krilo Bostona je sinoć odigralo partiju karijere. Hejvord je u Klivlendu ubacio 39 poena, postavio rekord karijere, zapečatio pobedu Bostona košem za 118:113, a tokom utakmice je za dva poena šutirao neverovatnih 16/16! Postao je uz Vilta Čemberlena jedini igrač u istoriji NBA lige koji je upisao 16 pogodaka za dva poena bez promašaja.
Hejvord je u leto 2018. došao u Boston kao veliko pojačanje iz Jute i već u prvoj utakmici doživeo stravičan prelom noge zbog kojeg je propustio celu prošlu sezonu. Vratio se ove sezone na parket i sinoć pokazao da će biti od ogromne koristi Seltiksima u borbi za vlast na Istoku. Pored 39 poena, upisao je sedam skokova i osam asistencija. Hejvord je veliku pomoć imao i u Kembi Vokeru koji je meč završio sa 25 poena i sedam uhvaćenih lopti. Klivlend je tek u finišu poslednje četvrtine uspeo da se vrati u meč i spusti razliku koji je najčešće iznosila desetak razlike za Seltikse, ali nije imao snage i kvaliteta za totoalni preokret. Kolin Sekston je upisao 21 poen kao najefikasniji igrač Kavsa.
U Čikagu je u centru pažnje bio Lebron Džejms. As Los Anđeles Lejkersa je upisao treći tripl-dabl zaredom u šestoj pobedi svog tima u nizu. Lejkersi su savladali Bulse 118:112, a Lebron je upisao 30 poena, 10 skokova i 11 asistencija. Na drugoj strani je Zek Levin sa 26 poena bio prva perjanica Čikaga koji je vodio u većem delu meča. U finišu prvog poluvremena, Bulsi su imali čak i 19 poena prednosti, vodili desetak razlike i u trećem kvartalu, ali nisu izdržali do kraja. Serijom od 13:0 na početku poslednje četvrtine, Lejkersi su preokrenuli i nastavili sa serijom pobeda.
Srpski centar Nikola Jokić je odigrao partiju ispod svog proseka, ali je dao doprinos Denverovoj pobedi nad Majamijijem od 109:89. Jokić je meč završio sa samo devet poena za 23 poena, šutirao je 4/12 iz igre i imao po pet skokova i asistencija. Džimi Batler je sa 16 poena bio najefikasniji u Majamiju.
Najzanimljiviji meč večeri je viđen u Šarlotu gde su domaći Hornetsi posole produžetaka savladali Indijanu 122:120. Pobednika je rešio Devonte Grejem poenima sa linije penala u poslednjem sekundu meča. Grejem je bio apsolutni junak pobede sa 35 poena, dok je Voren na drugoj strani ubacio dva manje.  

NBA rezultati

Klivlend – Boston 113:119/Sekston 21 – Hejvord 29/
Čikago 112 - LA Lejkers 118/Levin 26 – Džejms 30/
Denver – Majami 109:89/Mari 21 – Batler 16/
Šarlot – Indijana 122:120 (113:113)/Grejem 35 – Voren 33/
Atlanta – San Antonio 108:100/Jang 29 - Derozan 22/
Oklahoma – Orlando 102:94/Džildžus-Aleksander 24 – Gordon 15/






(FOITO: Reuters)
text:
Hayward Career Party - 39 points without a miss for two! Lebron triple-double again, Jokic below average
Lakers sixth consecutive win

06 Nov 2019

Although Lebron James enrolled in a new triple-double and led the Lakers to victory in Chicago, the face of the NBA league night is Gordon Hayward!
The Boston winger played a career game last night. Hayward scored 39 points in Cleveland, set a career record, sealed Boston with a basket of 118: 113, and shot a whopping 16/16 for two points! He became the only player in the history of the NBA League to score 16 goals for two points without a miss.
Hayward came to Boston in the summer of 2018 as a big boost from Utah and already suffered a horrific leg fracture in the first game that he missed all of last season. He returned to the parquet this season and showed last night that he would be of great use to the Celtics in the power struggle in the East. In addition to 39 points, he tallied seven rebounds and eight assists. Hayward also had a lot of help in Kemba Walker, which finished the match with 25 points and seven balls. Only in the final quarter did Cleveland manage to get back into the match and drop the difference, which was usually a dozen differences for the Celtics, but lacked the strength and quality to make a total reversal. Colin Sexton recorded 21 points as the Cows' most efficient player.
In Chicago, Lebron James was the center of attention. The Lakers' Ace entered the third triple-double in a row in his sixth win in a row. The Lakers defeated the Bulls 118: 112, and Lebron recorded 30 points, 10 rebounds and 11 assists. On the other hand, Zek Levin, 26 points, was the first runner-up in Chicago to lead most of the match. In the first-half finish, the Bulls had even a 19-point advantage, leading by a dozen differences in the third quarter, but did not last until the end. With the 13-0 series at the start of the last quarter, the Lakers reversed and went on to win the series.
Serbian center Nikola Jokic played a party below his average, but contributed to Denver's 109-89 victory over Miami. Jokic finished the match with just nine points for 23 points, kicked 4/12 from the game and had five rebounds and assists. Jimmy Butler, with 16 points, was the most efficient in Miami.
The most interesting match of the evening was seen in Charlotte where the home Hornets defeated Indiana 122: 120 after the extra time. The winner was settled by Devonte Graham points from the penalty line at the last second of the match. Graham was the absolute hero of the 35-point victory, while Warren on the other hand scored two less.

NBA results

Cleveland - Boston 113: 119 / Sexton 21 - Hayward 29 /
Chicago 112 - LA Lakers 118 / Levin 26 - James 30 /
Denver - Miami 109: 89 / Mar 21 - Butler 16 /
Charlotte - Indiana 122: 120 (113: 113) / Graham 35 - Warren 33 /
Atlanta - San Antonio 108: 100 / Yang 29 - Deroy 22 /
Oklahoma - Orlando 102: 94 / Giles-Alexander 24 - Gordon 15 /






(FOITO: Reuters)
